projects.title: Cubrebocas / Cactus21
projects.description: The Cubrebocas ('facemask' in Mexican spanish, which translates - litteraly - to 'cover mouth') project aimed to explore our world's perception within the global pandemic context. Cactus21 displays mostly Saguaro Cacti shot in the region of Sonora in northern Mexico.

projects.title: Lonely City People
projects.description:
"Through the darkness of future past 
The magician longs to see. 
One chants out between two worlds 
Fire walk with me."

projects.title: PrePandemia
projects.description: A retrospective look at what preceded the Cubrebocas projet

projects.title: Stolen Posters Berlin 2016-2019
projects.description: These posters were taken - physically - from the streets of Berlin between 2016 and 2019 and archived
